Title: A New Napkin
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Erik Oleson, Tonya Kong (story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Joanne Whalley
Plot: Matt prepares to cross the line, as Dex becomes more dangerous than ever and Fisk enacts his endgame.
